name: City Builder Construction Sim
description:
A massive metropolitan kingdom city construction project has started. Expert team of master town builder have gathered to build a mega town in beautiful metropolis. Team up your workers. Engage them in handing heavy industrial and construction cranes. Start building work by driving, parking, paving and excavation to construct amazing township in designer island city.

Features.
• Amazing Construction Missions.
• Realistic Cranes and Machinery.
• Mega Town Construction.
• Realistic Controllers.
• Thrilling and adventures levels.
• Fun tycoon game.
• Amazing crane operator learning.
